intro: Hemigraphis rumphii, commonly known as shining iron plant, is a flowering plant native to Southeast Asia. It thrives in moist, shaded environments and is often used in horticulture for its ornamental value. Hemigraphis rumphii is also appreciated for its ability to tolerate partial shade and its adaptability to various soil types.
